name: Fireflies.ai Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: Fireflies.ai Enterprise presents low risk with comprehensive enterprise controls, strong compliance framework, and no data training usage. The Enterprise plan addresses all major security concerns found in the free version through admin controls, audit capabilities, SSO integration, HIPAA compliance, and custom data retention. Recommended for enterprise use with proper configuration of admin controls and retention policies.
assessment_notes: Assessment based on publicly available documentation and pricing page features. Good transparency from vendor with detailed security documentation. Enterprise features clearly documented but detailed configuration guides require customer account access.

recommended_restrictions: Configure admin controls for sensitive meetings

recommendations.title: Configure Super Admin role and user groups
recommendations.description: Implement proper organizational hierarchy with Super Admin oversight and appropriate user group management

recommendations.title: Enable SSO and SCIM provisioning
recommendations.description: Integrate with enterprise identity management system for centralized user management and authentication

recommendations.title: Configure custom data retention policies
recommendations.description: Set appropriate retention periods based on organizational needs and compliance requirements

recommendations.title: Implement Rules Engine for meeting governance
recommendations.description: Configure automated rules for meeting recording, transcription, and access based on meeting sensitivity

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Fireflies.ai Enterprise presents low risk with comprehensive enterprise controls, strong compliance framework, and no data training usage. The Enterprise plan addresses all major security concerns found in the free version through admin controls, audit capabilities, SSO integration, HIPAA compliance, and custom data retention. Recommended for enterprise use with proper configuration of admin controls and retention policies.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Data stored in US cloud infrastructure by default with enterprise options for private storage and preferred location storage on Enterprise plan.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Uses 256-bit AES encryption for meeting notes and transcripts at rest, and TLS encryption for data in transit.

data_retention.justification: Customer-Controlled Retention - No data retention OR customer controls all retention periods OR immediate deletion available on demand - Enterprise plan includes custom data retention policies allowing organizations to set their own retention periods and deletion procedures.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - Fireflies has a 0-day data retention policy with all vendors with access to user content, ensuring none of your data is used for training AI models.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Clear policy that user data is not shared with third parties for training purposes and has contractual guarantees with processing vendors.

admin_management.justification: Full Enterprise Controls - Centralized admin dashboard + user provisioning/deprovisioning + role-based permissions + group management + domain verification - Enterprise plan includes Super Admin role, user groups, team analytics for admins, and comprehensive organizational management features.

audit_capabilities.justification: Good Auditing - Activity logs available + basic reporting + some user tracking capabilities - Enterprise plan includes team analytics and admin oversight capabilities, though detailed audit log specifications not fully documented in public materials.

integration.justification: Full Enterprise Integration - SAML/OIDC SSO + SCIM provisioning + Active Directory integration + API access for enterprise management - Enterprise plan explicitly includes SSO integration and API access for enterprise management.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - SOC 2 Type II and GDPR compliant with documented HIPAA compliance available through BAA. Some gaps in broader certification portfolio (ISO 27001 not mentioned).

data_processing_transparency.justification: Basic Transparency - General data processing description + retention periods stated + some third-party relationships disclosed - Clear documentation of data processing, retention policies, and third-party relationships available.

documentation_and_support.justification: Good Documentation - Clear privacy policy + basic security documentation + responsive support + annual transparency reports - Comprehensive security documentation, detailed blog posts, clear privacy policies, and dedicated account manager support for Enterprise customers.
